title: Freelance Fullstack Software Engineer
brief: I work freelance for some clients.

projects.title: Forestask
projects.subtitle: (Formely Florestarefa)
projects.mainGoal: Create a student friendly PWA with gamified elements which doubles as a Learning Management System for the school staff.
projects.details: I conceptualized Florestarefa during a Hackathon in 2022. Then I built it as a prototype using HTML, CSS and JS, and now I’m building it using the MERN (MongoDB, Express, React and Node.js) stack and GraphQL for data requests.
projects.outcomes: First prototype in HTML, CSS and JS. Student UI prototype in ReactJS and JSONServer. Partially complete PWA with login, registration and admin using the MERNG stack.
projects.tech: MongoDB, Typescript, ReactJS, Framer, Tailwind, Node.js, GraphQL, Apollo Server and Client, Vercel.

projects.title: GK Empreendimentos
projects.client: GK, a high-end condominiums developer in Santa Catarina, Brazil.
projects.mainGoal: Refactor a WordPress website into a SPA using ReactJS in the front-end and AWS Lambda, while also providing a CMS for it.
projects.details: I am spearheading the front-end design and CMS conception and execution while being mentored on the backend and infrastructure implementation by a Senior Software Engineer. I also worked out a data structure for each building selling information so it can be updated easily and quickly.
projects.outcomes: Partially Complete SPA. The generic frame for displaying each building’s information is ready, currently working on the company page and CMS development.
projects.tech: ReactJS, AWS Lambda, Typescript, Node.js, Vercel.

projects.mainGoal: Create a personal website to showcase my work and skills.
projects.details: I am building this website using Astro, a new static site builder that uses ReactJS, Vue, Svelte and Markdown. I'm also planning to implement serverless functions to fetch content in the future.
